nodes.text: Hazel Kelly is a former producer for Star Wars: The Old Republic at BioWare. She started working on The Old Republic in 2011 as an Area Manager for the former BioWare Ireland facility, before being promoted to Live Producer in 2014, where she coordinated more than 20 update releases. In 2015, she became Development Director for Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire, and at the end of that year she became Lead Development Director for Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne, until 2017 when she moved on to another BioWare's project: Anthem.
